description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党前党员，活跃于文化大革命时期。曾任《红旗》杂志副总编辑、中央文革小组成员、中共中央办公厅代主任等职。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a former member of the Chinese Communist Party, active during the Cultural Revolution. He served as deputy editor-in-chief of 'Red Flag' magazine, a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, and acting director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的已故主要缔造者和领导人。在戚本禹的政治生涯早期，他曾对其表示赏识和提拔。
description.en: A deceased principal founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He showed appreciation and promoted Qi Benyu in the early stages of Qi's political career.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。据记载，他在七·二〇事件后向毛泽东进言，促成了对王力、关锋、戚本禹等人的审查。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China. It is recorded that after the Wuhan Incident, he advised Mao Zedong, which led to the investigation of Wang Li, Guan Feng, and Qi Benyu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，曾任国家主席。戚本禹发表的文章《爱国主义还是卖国主义？》开启了对他的公开不点名批判。
description.en: A statesman of the People's Republic of China who served as Chairman. An article by Qi Benyu, 'Patriotism or National Betrayal?', initiated public, unnamed criticism against him.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义历史学家。其历史主义观点曾被戚本禹在文章中批判为“资产阶级观点”。
description.en: A Chinese Marxist historian. His historicist views were criticized by Qi Benyu in an article as 'bourgeois viewpoints'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治思想家，因撰写《出身论》挑战血统论而在文革期间被迫害。戚本禹曾宣布《出身论》为“大毒草”。
description.en: A Chinese political thinker persecuted during the Cultural Revolution for writing 'On Family Background' which challenged the theory of bloodline. Qi Benyu declared 'On Family Background' a 'great poisonous weed'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中央文革小组成员。与戚本禹、关锋一同在1967年失势。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. He fell from power in 1967 along with Qi Benyu and Guan Feng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中央文革小组成员。与戚本禹、王力一同在1967年失势。晚年与戚本禹合作编辑《中华易学大辞典》。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group. He fell from power in 1967 along with Qi Benyu and Wang Li. In his later years, he co-edited the 'Great Dictionary of Chinese Yi-ology' with Qi Benyu.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。戚本禹晚年曾对其表示支持和称赞。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China. In his later years, Qi Benyu expressed support and praise for him.

description.zh-cn: 曾任毛泽东的秘书。戚本禹在文革开始后接替了他的部分职务。
description.en: He once served as Mao Zedong's secretary. Qi Benyu took over some of his duties after the start of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Qi Benyu.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的私人医生，著有《毛泽东私人医生回忆录》，该书后来受到戚本禹的批判。
description.en: Mao Zedong's personal physician, author of 'The Private Life of Chairman Mao', which was later criticized by Qi Benyu.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。戚本禹是该运动中的核心人物之一，担任中央文革小组成员。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong. Qi Benyu was one of the central figures in this movement, serving as a member of the Central Cultural Revolution Group.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发动的政治运动。戚本禹在1958年的整风运动中受到波及，被定性为“反党”，后被毛泽东解救。
description.en: A political movement launched in mainland China in 1957. Qi Benyu was affected during the 1958 rectification movement, labeled as 'anti-Party', and later rescued by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间设立的领导机构，实际取代了中共中央政治局和中央书记处。戚本禹是其关键成员之一。
description.en: A leading body established during the Cultural Revolution, which effectively replaced the Politburo and the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee. Qi Benyu was one of its key members.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。戚本禹于1949年入党，文革后被开除党籍。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Qi Benyu joined the party in 1949 and was later expelled after the Cultural Revolution.

en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构。戚本禹曾在此担任多个职务，包括代主任。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. Qi Benyu held several positions here, including acting director.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关刊物。戚本禹曾任该杂志副总编辑，并发表多篇重要文章。
description.en: The official journal of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. Qi Benyu served as its deputy editor-in-chief and published several important articles in it.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央团校

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央团校

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的全国性重点院校。戚本禹的教育背景之一。
description.en: A national key institution of the Communist Youth League of China. It is part of Qi Benyu's educational background.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市的大型公共图书馆。戚本禹出狱后曾在此担任图书管理员直至退休。
description.en: A large public library located in Shanghai. After his release from prison, Qi Benyu worked here as a librarian until his retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的司法机关。该法院于1983年判处戚本禹有期徒刑18年。
description.en: A judicial body in Beijing, People's Republic of China. This court sentenced Qi Benyu to 18 years in prison in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的出版社，出版了《戚本禹回忆录》。
description.en: A publishing house based in Hong Kong that published 'Memoirs of Qi Benyu'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的一个行政区，是戚本禹的出生地。
description.en: An administrative region during the Republic of China period, and the birthplace of Qi Benyu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。戚本禹于1942年迁居于此，晚年也在此居住并逝世。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China. Qi Benyu moved here in 1942, and also lived and passed away here in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 1966年5月中共中央政治局扩大会议通过的文件，被认为是文化大革命全面发动的标志。戚本禹是起草人之一。
description.en: A document passed by the enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee in May 1966, considered the signal for the full launch of the Cultural Revolution. Qi Benyu was one of its drafters.

description.zh-cn: 由遇罗克撰写的挑战血统论的文章。1967年被戚本禹宣布为“大毒草”。
description.en: An article written by Yu Luoke challenging the theory of bloodline. It was declared a 'great poisonous weed' by Qi Benyu in 1967.

nodes.id: 毛泽东私人医生回忆录

zh-cn: 毛泽东私人医生回忆录
en: The Private Life of Chairman Mao

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东前私人医生李志绥撰写的回忆录。戚本禹曾撰文批判此书。
description.en: A memoir written by Mao Zedong's former personal physician, Li Zhisui. Qi Benyu wrote articles criticizing this book.

description.zh-cn: 一部关于《易经》研究的工具书。戚本禹晚年曾与关锋等人共同编辑此书。
description.en: A reference book on the study of the I Ching. Qi Benyu co-edited this book with Guan Feng and others in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹本人的回忆录，于其去世同月在香港出版。
description.en: The memoir of Qi Benyu himself, published in Hong Kong in the same month as his death.

description.zh-cn: 导致戚本禹于2016年去世的疾病。
description.en: The disease that caused the death of Qi Benyu in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 邱云英是戚本禹的妻子。
description.en: Qiu Yunying was Qi Benyu's wife.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团中央团校

description.zh-cn: 1949年加入中国共产党，后被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1949 and was later expelled.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Secretariat Bureau, Acting Director

description.zh-cn: 1986年出狱后在上海图书馆收藏部当图书管理员，至1990年代初退休。
description.en: After his release from prison in 1986, he worked as a librarian in the collection department of the Shanghai Library until his retirement in the early 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的整风运动中，戚本禹等人因向上级反映问题，被借反右运动之机批判为“反党”。
description.en: During the 1958 rectification movement, Qi Benyu and others were criticized as 'anti-Party' under the pretext of the Anti-Rightist Campaign for reporting issues to their superiors.

description.zh-cn: 在反右运动中解救了被批判的戚本禹，并对其后来发表的史学文章大加赞赏，称其为“要接班”的“坚定的人”。
description.en: Rescued the criticized Qi Benyu during the Anti-Rightist Campaign and highly praised his later historical articles, calling him a 'steadfast person' who should 'take over'.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹发表《为革命而研究历史》一文，批评翦伯赞的历史主义观点是“超阶级”、“纯客观”的资产阶级观点。
description.en: Qi Benyu published 'Studying History for the Revolution', criticizing Jian Bozan's historicist views as 'supra-class' and 'purely objective' bourgeois viewpoints.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹是《五一六通知》的起草人之一。
description.en: Qi Benyu was one of the drafters of the 'May 16 Notification'.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》的通过被视为文化大革命全面发动的标志。
description.en: The passing of the 'May 16 Notification' is considered the sign for the full-scale launch of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹发表文章《爱国主义还是卖国主义？——评历史影片〈清宫秘史〉》，开启了对时任国家主席刘少奇的公开不点名批判。
description.en: Qi Benyu published 'Patriotism or National Betrayal? — A Critique of the Historical Film The Secret History of the Qing Court', which initiated public, unnamed criticism of then-State Chairman Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 遇罗克是《出身论》的作者。
description.en: Yu Luoke is the author of 'On Family Background'.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹宣布遇罗克所写的《出身论》是“大毒草”，导致遇罗克进一步受到政治迫害。
description.en: Qi Benyu declared 'On Family Background' written by Yu Luoke to be a 'great poisonous weed', leading to further political persecution of Yu Luoke.

description.zh-cn: 七·二〇事件后，周恩来向毛泽东进言解决王力、关锋、戚本禹的问题，最终导致戚本禹于1968年1月被隔离审查。
description.en: After the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai advised Mao Zedong to address the issue of Wang Li, Guan Feng, and Qi Benyu, which ultimately led to Qi Benyu being placed in isolation for investigation in January 1968.

description.zh-cn: 七·二〇事件后，周恩来向毛泽东进言解决王力、关锋、戚本禹的问题，最终导致王力被隔离审查。
description.en: After the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai advised Mao Zedong to address the issue of Wang Li, Guan Feng, and Qi Benyu, which ultimately led to Wang Li being placed in isolation for investigation.

description.zh-cn: 七·二〇事件后，周恩来向毛泽东进言解决王力、关锋、戚本禹的问题，最终导致关锋被隔离审查。
description.en: After the Wuhan Incident, Zhou Enlai advised Mao Zedong to address the issue of Wang Li, Guan Feng, and Qi Benyu, which ultimately led to Guan Feng being placed in isolation for investigation.

description.zh-cn: 以反革命宣传煽动罪、诬告陷害罪、聚众打砸抢罪判处戚本禹有期徒刑18年。
description.en: Sentenced Qi Benyu to 18 years in prison for counter-revolutionary propaganda and incitement, false accusation, and organizing violent mass destruction.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹出狱后与关锋等人合作编辑了《中华易学大辞典》。
description.en: After his release from prison, Qi Benyu collaborated with Guan Feng and others to edit the 'Great Dictionary of Chinese Yi-ology'.

description.zh-cn: 关锋出狱后与戚本禹等人合作编辑了《中华易学大辞典》。
description.en: After his release from prison, Guan Feng collaborated with Qi Benyu and others to edit the 'Great Dictionary of Chinese Yi-ology'.

relationships.target: 毛泽东私人医生回忆录

description.zh-cn: 李志绥是《毛泽东私人医生回忆录》的作者。
description.en: Li Zhisui is the author of 'The Private Life of Chairman Mao'.

relationships.target: 毛泽东私人医生回忆录

description.zh-cn: 1996年，戚本禹在接受访谈时批判了李志绥的《毛泽东私人医生回忆录》。
description.en: In 1996, Qi Benyu criticized Li Zhisui's 'The Private Life of Chairman Mao' in an interview.

description.zh-cn: 2014年，戚本禹在接受采访时表达了对中共中央总书记习近平的支持。
description.en: In 2014, Qi Benyu expressed his support for CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping in an interview.

description.zh-cn: 戚本禹因胃癌于2016年4月20日在上海去世。
description.en: Qi Benyu died of stomach cancer in Shanghai on April 20, 2016.

description.zh-cn: 该出版社在戚本禹去世当月出版了其回忆录。
description.en: This publishing house published Qi Benyu's memoir in the same month of his death.
